revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Flower Paradise |image = [[File:Flower Paradise.png|300px]] |caption = A bird's-eye view of Flower Paradise. |tokens = 96,500 |location = North of Route 224. }} '''Flower Paradise''' is a [[dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 2,603,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Gloom.png|40px]] Gloom || colspan=2 rowspan=7| <center>N/A |- | [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout |- | [[File:Tangela.png|40px]] Tangela |- | [[File:Skiploom.png|40px]] Skiploom |- | [[File:Lombre.png|40px]] Lombre |- | [[File:Seedot.png|40px]] Seedot |- | [[File:Roselia.png|40px]] Roselia |}
===Boss Encounters=== <!--T:5-->
<!--T:6--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Parasect.png|40px]] Parasect || <center>9,900,000 || rowspan=4 colspan=3 | <center> N/A |- | [[File:Breloom.png|40px]] Breloom || rowspan=3|<center>11,000,000 |- | [[File:Shaymin_(land).png|40px]] Shaymin (land) |- | [[File:Shaymin_(sky).png|40px]] '''Shaymin (sky)*''' |} '''*Note Shaymin (land) must be caught for Shaymin (sky) to appear.'''
==Items== <!--T:7-->
<tabs> <!--T:8--> <tab name="No Debuff">
<!--T:9--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 25.24% || 24.44% || 21.06% |- | {{Bag2|Mago}} || N/A || 25.24% || 24.44% || 21.06% |- | {{Bag2|Aguav}} || N/A || 25.24% || 24.44% || 21.06% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 10.11% || 10.69% || 13.14% |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 10.11% || 10.69% || 13.14% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Meadow Plate}} || N/A || 2.03% || 2.65% || 5.27% |- | {{Bag2|Sky Plate}} || N/A || 2.03% || 2.65% || 5.27% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:10-->
<!--T:11--> After Reaching Alola, the drop chance for items in Sinnoh will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:12--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 25.03% || 25.03% || 25.03% |- | {{Bag2|Mago}} || N/A || 25.03% || 25.03% || 25.03% |- | {{Bag2|Aguav}} || N/A || 25.03% || 25.03% || 25.03% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 12.01% || 12.01% || 12.01% |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 12.01% || 12.01% || 12.01% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Meadow Plate}} || N/A || 0.45% || 0.45% || 0.45% |- | {{Bag2|Sky Plate}} || N/A || 0.45% || 0.45% || 0.45% |} </tab> </tabs>
